Subject: Major Incident Notification: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall

Major Incident Notification: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 30-09-2024

Time: 08:00 AM GST

 

Dear all,


Please be informed that there is a network outage in Dubai mall. Stores are unable to connect to the group wifi.

 

Tech teams are actively investigating the issue. 

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C8996d4c42b614d72734c08dce10d9f61%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638632696216342117%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5FFY6zZQOzBQki%2BXo1tKBkP3zFcjGpwtVv%2FhC2UgxXU%3D&reserved=0> .
